DOC.brief_summary: This study design evaluate safety efficacy long-term exposure KHK4827 subject moderate severe plaque psoriasis complete precede Study 4827-002 .
DOC.criteria: Subject voluntarily sign write informed consent form participate study Subject complete week 12 evaluation Study 4827002 Subject serious infection , define require systemic treatment antibiotic antiviral ( exclude oral administration ) Subject judge ineligible participation study investigators/subinvestigators
